## FIB4index

$$FIB4index = \dfrac {AST\left( IU/L\right) \times Age\left( years\right)}{Plt\left( 10^{9}/L \right) \times \sqrt{ALT \left( IU/L\right) }}$$

## NAFLD fibrosis score(NFS)

$$\begin{aligned}NFS = -1.675 + 0.037 \times Age\left( years\right)  
                       + 0.094 \times BMI\left( kg/m^2\right)
                       + 1.13 \times IFG/diabetes\left( yes = 1, no = 0\right) \\
                       + 0.99 \times AST/ALT ratio 
                       - 0.013 \times Plt\left( 10^{9}/L \right) 
                       - 0.66 \times Alb\left( g/dL \right)\end{aligned}$$
